data.sentence: The word أَوْ comes from the root ا و and is associated with the meanings: or

data.meanings: (Dal-Nun-Alif) To be near, come near or low, let down, be akin to.
data.sentence: The word أَدْنَى comes from the root د ن و and is associated with the meanings: (Dal-Nun-Alif) To be near, come near or low, let down, be akin to.

data.meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.
data.sentence: The word فَكَانَ comes from the root ك و ن and is associated with the meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.

data.meanings: to dig a hole like an egg, draw near, fly away. qab - space between the middle and the end of a bow, portion of a bow that is between the part which is grasped by the hand and the curved extremity, space of one extremity of the bow to the other, short measure of space/length/distance (often used to imply closeness of relationship).
data.sentence: The word قَابَ comes from the root ق و ب and is associated with the meanings: to dig a hole like an egg, draw near, fly away. qab - space between the middle and the end of a bow, portion of a bow that is between the part which is grasped by the hand and the curved extremity, space of one extremity of the bow to the other, short measure of space/length/distance (often used to imply closeness of relationship).

data.meanings: to compare by measurement, precede anyone, measure a thing, imitate anyone. qausun - bow.
data.sentence: The word قَوْسَيْنِ comes from the root ق و س and is associated with the meanings: to compare by measurement, precede anyone, measure a thing, imitate anyone. qausun - bow.
